title: How many times should I read the NCERT before starting another book or coaching study materials? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: NCERT is all about revision. U should have a consistent schedule in order to master NCERT. Whether u r going through any other side books it hardly matters but u must provide 2–3hrs perpetually on daily basis for ncert. U should arrange ur schedule such that at least u could cover some portion of both theoritical as well as numerical part and 0.5–1hr conditional for previous portion revision. If u could maintain this schedule than u could go for any other books or supplements.
